sys_update_xml.payload: customc .circle-green{ color: #33ab45; } .circle-red{ color: #d92912; } .circle-yellow{ color: #e0cc27; } .circle-blue{ color: #0085d2; } .circle-gray{ color: #dcd8d9; } .form-control-feedback { color: #666; } .form-control:focus + .form-control-feedback { color: #74ACBB; } .form-control { border: 1px solid #74ACBB !important; } .search-cases{ float:right; } .container.search{ padding-bottom: 20px; padding-top:20px; } //here new code .body{ font-family: "Source Sans Pro script=all rev=2", "SourceSansPro", "Source Sans Pro", "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.42857; color: #666; } .card-wrapper{ display:flex; align-items:center; align-content:center; flex-direction:column; } .card{ color: #293E40; padding: 28px 28px 5px 28px; width:32rem; background-color: white; display:flex; flex-direction:column; align-items:start; justify-content:flex-start; margin:2rem 0; box-shadow: .5rem .5rem 3rem rgba(0,0,0,0.2); .event-title{ margin: 0; color: #293E40; font-size: 20px; font-weight: 600 } h5{ display:inline; color: #293E40 !important; font-family: "Source Sans Pro script=all rev=2", "SourceSansPro", "Source Sans Pro", "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; } } @media screen and (min-width: 700px) { .card-wrapper{ flex-direction: row; flex-wrap: wrap; justify-content: center; align-items: center; } .card{ margin: 2rem; transition:transform .5s; } .card:hover{ transform: scale(1.05); } } .body-card{ margin-top:12px; border-top: 1px solid #DBE1E7; color: #666; width:100%; list-style:none; display:flex; justify-content:flex-start; padding: 2rem 0; margin-top: 1.5 rem; text-decoration: none; } } sp_instancetruecards-widgetfalseCards Widget[{"name":"table","section":"other","default_value":"sn_customerservice_case","label":"table","type":"string"}]falsefalsesp_widgetClaudita2019-06-14 17:08:5841c54c2d1382ff00dd4e3192e144b0c3438Cards Widgetglobalglobalsp_widget_41c54c2d1382ff00dd4e3192e144b0c3claudia.cruz2019-09-27 22:46:14
